content: great write Piyush Kamal. All your points are the mandatory ones to influence our lives for the better. I have one more point here “Do not compare with others,on what they have achieved. You never know how their journey had been.”We tend to start comparing with the successes of others and feel frustrated and demotivated because of that.We need to realize that “everyone has their own path and their own journey,that is why everybody is unique.”
